<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the current level of damage for a specific Hit Point (specified by its config class).
* 0: no damage
* 1: full damage
See also [[BIS_fnc_setHitPointDamage]] for setting hit with dependency</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''setHitPointDamage''' [hitPointName, damage, useEffects]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle : [[Object]] - vehicle to be damaged </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [hitPointName, damage]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> hitPointName: [[String]] - name of the Hit Point class </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> damage: [[Number]] - level of damage </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5 </name>=<value> useEffects (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to skip destruction effects. Default: [[true]] (Since Arma 3 v1.67)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[setHitPointDamage]] ["hitEngine2", 1.0];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setHitPointDamage]] ["hitHead", 0.5];
[[player]] [[setHitPointDamage]] ["hitBody", 0.5];
[[player]] [[setHitPointDamage]] ["hitHands", 0.5];
[[player]] [[setHitPointDamage]] ["hitLegs", 0.5];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getHitPointDamage]], [[getAllHitPointsDamage]], [[setHit]], [[getHit]], [[setDamage]], [[damage]], [[getHitIndex]], [[setHitIndex]], [[BIS_fnc_setHitPointDamage]], [[getHitPointDamage#Notes|Common TKOH Hit Points]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 30, 2012 - 13:54
<dt class="note">[[User:Master85|Master85]]
<dd class="note">This command is using the Hit Points (defined in the HitPoints class in the config) while [[setHit]] is using [[Named_Selection|Named Selections]] (defined in the model itself).

<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 10, 2016
<dt class="note">[[User:Kju|Kju]]
<dd class="note">This command has no affect when [[allowDamage]] is false.

<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 14, 2016 - 03:06
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]
<dd class="note">Mention that '''setHitPointDamage''' only can be executed localy, while the [[getHitPointDamage]] is global.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
